ro,Romania,Medical,6020,1,833535888,REGINA MARIA,CENTRUL MEDICAL UNIREA SRL,https://apps.apple.com/ro/app/regina-maria/id833535888?uo=4,0.0,4.8737,20008,Medical,"Aplicatia care te ajuta sa ai grija de tine
Simplu, placut si eficient.
Cu aplicatia Regina Maria, vizitele la medic devin mai cool ca niciodata.
Pastreaza toate informatiile despre sanatatea ta, intr-un dosar medical digital care nu se pierde niciodata.
Preventie, ingrijire si solutii medicale in care poti avea incredere, direct pe telefonul tau →
3 pasi simpli ca sa folosesti aplicatia:

column2: 3. Beneficiaza, inca din prima zi, de o experienta medicala completa.

column1: Cum te ajuta aplicatia Regina Maria?

column2: Te programezi online: simplu si rapid

column3: Te programezi rapid la specialitatea dorita sau medicul preferat, fara sa mai astepti o confirmare prin Contact Center.
Nu mai poti ajunge? Anuleaza programarea in timp util, in doar cateva secunde, direct din contul tau.

column2: ○     Stii ce te doare, dar nu stii la ce specialitate ar fi cel mai potrivit sa te programezi? Asistentul Virtual este aici sa te ajute - afla cauza simptomelor tale in mai putin de 5 minute. Mai mult, ai 93% acuratete in identificarea cauzei simptomelor tale.

column3: Cu functia de check-in online, stii imediat unde mergi pentru consultatie, fara sa mai treci pe la receptie.
Ca sa afli rapid etajul si cabinetul, intra in sectiunea “Programari” din contul tau si apasa “check-in”.

column2: Sau mergi rapid la Clinica Virtuala

column3: Acum poti sa ceri opinia avizata a unui medic specialist, direct din confortul casei tale.
Beneficiaza de consultatii online, cu aceleasi avantaje cu programarile la care mergi fizic.

column2: Dosarul tau medical este mereu la indemana:

column3: Ai acces simplificat la intregul tau istoric medical, inclusiv rezultatele analizelor, consultatiile si istoricul de spitalizari, direct de pe telefon.

column2: ○    Iti pastrezi mereu in siguranta, intr-un singur loc, analizele medicale, programarile si tratamentele recomandate.

column3: Primesti recomandari direct in contul tau pentru a ajunge la medicul specializat in afectiunea ta.
Economisesti timp: lista de analize necesare este deja pregatita de un specialist pentru ca tu sa te programezi rapid.
#peabonament ai tarife personalizate atunci cand mergi la consultatii cu o recomandare.

column2: Economisesti, in timp ce te ingrijesti:

column3: Tii evidenta cheltuielilor: acum stii mereu ce servicii ai incluse in abonament si cat economisesti in comparatie cu preturile standard.
In sectiunea ""Abonamentele tale"" ai acces permanent la serviciile incluse, costuri si economii.

column1: ●     Este tot mai simplu sa ai grija de cei dragi:

column3: Daca esti parinte, poti asocia contul copilului tau cu usurinta pentru acces rapid la dosarul sau medical si viitoare programari.
Poti achita facturile sau consultatiile efectuate, direct din aplicatie.

column1: Bucura-te de beneficii
3 pasi simpli pentru a-ti activa contul la Regina Maria.
1. Inregistrare rapida
Creeaza-ti contul folosind datele tale de Apple, Google, Facebook sau email. Daca ai nevoie de ajutor, ne gasesti la 021 9268.
2. Confirmare simpla
Verifica-ti emailul si telefonul printr-un link si un cod SMS.
De acum ai acces partial in aplicatie: te poti programa, insa nu poti verifica “Dosarul medical”.
Pentru acces complet, mergi la pasul 3.
3. Acces complet
Autentifica-te in aplicatie, acceseaza Dosarul medical si alege optiunea ""Vreau sa validez acum"".
In doar cateva ore, ai acces total la istoricul tau medical.
Validarea poate dura pana la 24 de ore sau o poti solicita oricand, in orice locatie Regina Maria.
Este atat de simplu sa mergi la medic.
Descarca aplicatia Regina Maria si descopera o noua experienta de preventie si ingrijire.

ro,Romania,Medical,6020,2,505864483,Pregnancy + | Tracker App,Philips Digital UK Limited,https://apps.apple.com/ro/app/pregnancy-tracker-app/id505864483?uo=4,0.0,4.92849,2489,Medical,"Download the world's leading pregnancy tracker app today, for free week-by-week pregnancy information and articles!

The Pregnancy+ app features expert advice, daily articles, healthcare tips and interactive 3D models so you can track your baby's development. Our pregnancy app has been downloaded over 80 million times by expecting families. Join our worldwide community today!
Baby Development
► Unique, interactive 3D models showing your baby's development
► Baby Size Guide helps you visualise your baby's size in fruits, animals & sweets
► Pregnancy Week-by-Week Guides explain what to expect in each pregnancy week
► Simple & informative Pregnancy Timeline highlighting important milestones
Pregnancy Guides & Information
► In-depth Pregnancy Guides covering breastfeeding, exercise, food, twins & more
► Daily Pregnancy Articles, tailored to your pregnancy stage
► 2D & 3D Scans by pregnancy week for you to browse
► Daily Blog Posts with tips, tricks & helpful advice
► Upload photos in My Bump to create a visual pregnancy diary
Pregnancy Tools
► Pregnancy Due Date Calculator helps you work out when your bundle will arrive
► Kick Counter tracks your baby's movements & activity
► Pregnancy Weight Log helps you keep an eye on changes in your weight
► Contraction Timer measures contractions throughout your labour
Organise & Plan
► Pregnancy Calendar enables you to plan & document your prenatal appointments
► Hospital Bag helps you prepare your hospital visit, for Mother, Birth Partner & Baby
► Birth Plan allows you to customise, organise & export your needs & wishes
► To-Do List & Baby Shopping List for ideas of what you need to do & buy
► Search thousands of Baby Names for inspiration & share your favourites
Our EXCLUSIVE 3D Models
Enjoy our unique 3D models showing your pregnancy's week-by-week development, from blastocyst to foetus to baby. Our 3D models truly help you to connect with the baby growing inside you.
► Choose from multiple ethnicities
► Zoom in or out & rotate to see the baby's intricate detail
► Watch guided pregnancy week-by-week walk-throughs
► Tap to see baby movements
Pregnancy Articles & Guides

If you're feeling overwhelmed by all the advice out there, don't worry. Our Pregnancy + tracker app will guide you through your pregnancy, week-by-week, keeping you up to date with your baby's development and helping you stay healthy through pregnancy and beyond. The Pregnancy+ app content is written in-house, with the help of medical experts, lactation consultants, midwives and, of course, parents.
Share your journey with friends & family

Our pregnancy tracker app can be personalised so your partner, future grandparents or best friend can join in the fun and follow your baby's development in the womb, from bump to birth! Keep everyone up to date with your pregnancy by inviting them to download the app today.
Follow us on Social Media
Facebook: facebook.com/PregnancyPlusApp
Instagram: @pregnancyplus
◆ Download Pregnancy+ App today ◆
Privacy Policy
https://info.philips-digital.com/PrivacyNotice?locale=en&country=GB
Terms of Use
https://info.philips-digital.com/TermsOfUse?locale=en&country=GB

This app is not intended for medical use, or to replace the advice of a trained medical doctor. If you have any concerns about your pregnancy, consult with your doctor or midwife.
The Pregnancy + tracker app wishes you a healthy, full-term pregnancy and a safe delivery.",2012-04-05T21:54:25Z,2025-11-13T14:20:55Z

ro,Romania,Medical,6020,3,1551985892,MedLife,MED LIFE SA,https://apps.apple.com/ro/app/medlife/id1551985892?uo=4,0.0,4.86025,12193,Medical,"Descarcă aplicația MedLife și ai acces la servicii și informații medicale la un click distanță, oricând, de pe telefonul mobil.

ro,Romania,Medical,6020,5,1144871267,Pregnancy Tracker by Moms,Wachanga LTD,https://apps.apple.com/ro/app/pregnancy-tracker-by-moms/id1144871267?uo=4,0.0,4.87493,4022,Medical,"Discover one of the top pregnancy tracker apps designed specifically for women and expecting parents. This application will keep you calm throughout your pregnancy, providing daily insights into your baby's development and your own health. It will let you know what’s happening with you and your unborn baby—week after week—and offer guidance on how to handle new situations. New, helpful articles are posted every day to support your pregnancy journey!

Keep track of your weight, blood pressure, tummy growth, baby's first movements, and contractions with our advanced tracking tools. Save all your important data in a single, easy-to-share report for your doctor, ensuring your pregnancy progress is well-documented.
May your pregnancy be pleasant and wonderful! Our app provides the tools and resources expecting parents need to feel confident and prepared.
The Most Interesting Features of the App:
- Convenient Calendar: Schedule tests and doctor visits effortlessly.
- Pregnancy Diary: Use this tracker to log your weight, tummy size, blood pressure, mood, and sexual activity daily. Never miss appointments or key tests.

- Weekly Baby Development Updates: Find out when your baby becomes the size of a grapefruit, grows eyelashes, or when you can discover their gender. Get nutritional and lifestyle advice tailored for women and their babies.
- Daily Articles: Access a wealth of resources and tools with professional advice to help women navigate emotions, relationships, and health during pregnancy.
- Doctor Report: Compile all your tracking data into a comprehensive report, available as a PDF or on your phone, to share with your doctor.
- Checklists and To-Do Lists: Stay organized with trimester-specific checklists and to-do lists—perfect for expecting parents.
- Smart Gestational Age Calculator: Trusted by top medical professionals, this tool calculates fetal and obstetric terms with pinpoint accuracy.
- Kegel Exercises: Prepare for childbirth with guided exercises, an essential tool for women’s health during pregnancy.
- Contraction Counter: This intelligent tracker distinguishes real contractions from practice ones, ensuring you and your baby are ready for delivery.
- Health App Synchronization: Securely save your pregnancy tracking data with seamless integration.

We’ve worked hard to create one of the best apps for expectant mothers. Send your feedback to team@wachanga.com (mailto:team@wachanga.com)—we’re here to support women and parents every step of the way.
GOLD STATUS IN THE APP
- The subscription costs $1.99 per month
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
- Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
- Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable
- Private Policy - https://wachanga.com/privacy
- Terms of Use - https://wachanga.com/terms",2017-03-20T02:32:27Z,2025-11-13T01:09:53Z

ro,Romania,Medical,6020,6,1207424206,Full Code Medical Simulation,Full Code Medical Inc.,https://apps.apple.com/ro/app/full-code-medical-simulation/id1207424206?uo=4,0.0,4.82857,35,Medical,"Full Code is an intuitive, mobile-first simulation designed by medical experts for individuals who want to become better medical professionals, including medical students, residents, physicians, nurses, NPs, PAs, EMTs, paramedics, and more.

The platform offers over 230+ realistic virtual cases and an engaging, game-like interface. You can choose from hundreds of possible actions as you diagnose and treat acutely sick patients in this open-ended medical simulation.
Daily, deliberate practice is the key to maintaining and improving your clinical skills. Download and play a free case today!
Interested in bringing Full Code to your organization or institution? Learn more at fullcodemedical.com!
Features:
• 230+ case library written and peer-reviewed by expert clinicians
• Over 30 diagnostic disciplines, including Emergency Medicine, OBGYN, and Pediatrics
• 25+ realistic avatars, including pediatric and adult patients
• *NEW* EMS cases and ambulance environment
• Detailed scoring and full case breakdowns - learn your strengths and weaknesses
• Patient AI enables practice with history taking
• Full Code Pro + CME provides 100+ hours of accredited CME
• Frequent new cases and regular updates
TRAIN ON YOUR TERMS

Full Code’s on-demand simulation training with realistic virtual patients allows you to practice complex cases and enhance your skills whenever you get a break, wherever you happen to be, on the devices you already own.
IMPROVE YOUR CONFIDENCE

Full Code's infinitely repeatable cases measure skills in both diagnosis and management, allowing you to learn from your mistakes in a risk-free environment. Build competence so you can face complex real-world cases with confidence.
PRACTICE MAKES THE PRACTITIONER

Frequent, deliberate practice is the key to clinical success and improving your clinical decision-making ability. Full Code can easily fit into any schedule—whether you're a med student or practicing clinician.
NEW CHALLENGES

Every case presents a new challenge in Full Code: from routine diagnosis to rare diseases. You’re not just limited to the hospital, either—Full Code has expanded into pre-hospital and EMS content. Get out of the ED and into the ambulance for all new scenarios!
LEARN FROM TOP MEDICAL EXPERTS

Created by medical educators from some of the top hospitals in the U.S. and peer-reviewed by licensed medical professionals, our simulations are designed with industry-standard medical best practices, setting the bar high for medical students and professionals worldwide.
EARN CME CREDIT

Complete your continuing medical education (CME) requirements with flexible and engaging simulation challenges accredited through the Accreditation Council for Continuing Medical Education (ACCME). With our PRO+CME subscription, you can earn up to 100 CME credits. Subscribe to Full Code Pro+CME to get started.
FEATURED APP STORE REVIEWS
Fun and Educational
“I’m in nursing school and my partner is in medical school. We play for fun and it teaches a lot, certainly makes you think more and how not to order everything under the sun. Highly recommend!”
—Kirsten9008
Exactly what EM needed
“Happened to stumble upon the app when I was looking for virtual EM sim learning. It’s exactly what I was looking for. It’s well developed and thought out with pertinent information. Thank you!”
— ariamour
Worth every penny!

“For those looking for a simple but entertaining way to study and prepare for clerkships, think through cases in residency, or even prepare for your oral boards, I think Full Code is the learning tool for you…Thank you, Full Code, for being a long-time study partner! Looking forward to your continued dedication to medical education!”
— Hartridge
FOLLOW FULL CODE
Facebook: facebook.com/fullcodemedical
Twitter: @fullcodemedical
Instagram: @fullcodemedical
TikTok: @fullcodemedical
Website: fullcodemedical.com
Play on desktop: app.fullcodemedical.com",2017-07-26T20:19:14Z,2025-08-13T20:44:10Z

ro,Romania,Medical,6020,7,1444729150,Donorium,Smart Society,https://apps.apple.com/ro/app/donorium/id1444729150?uo=4,0.0,2.03571,84,Medical,"Există mereu un pacient care are nevoie urgentă de sânge, iar prin Donorium îl poți salva chiar tu!
Descarcă acum Donorium, programează-te și donează! Intră în Armata Donatorilor și luptă alături de noi ca niciun pacient să nu mai audă vreodată de la doctori ""Nu avem sânge pentru operație...""!
Ce poți face în Donorium?
• Afli dacă ești eligibil pentru donare printr-un quiz cu întrebări.
• Afli tot ce ai nevoie să știi despre donare din ghidul donatorului.
• Ești notificat în timp real dacă centrele au nevoie de sânge.
• Îți faci programare la donare de sânge, plasmă sau trombocite.
• Donezi la centrele de transfuzie sau la evenimente de donare publice sau private.
• Vezi ruta către centrul de transfuzie sau evenimentul de donare.
• Planifici donările pentru tot anul.
• Înregistrezi donările și știi exact când să donezi.
• Câștigi puncte, grade și medalii pentru toate acțiunile pe care le faci.
• Concurezi cu ceilalți donatori în clasament și poți vedea ce au făcut ei pentru a crește.
• Poți înregistra donarile anterioare pentru a crește în clasament.
• Știi câte vieți ai salvat și poți vedea toată activitatea ta.
• Poți raporta un caz care are nevoie de sânge și notifici alți donatori să vină la donare.
• Inviți prieteni cu codul tău la donare și crești mai repede în clasament.
• Vorbești în direct în chat cu echipa Donorium despre colaborări, voluntariat sau probleme întâmpinate.
Descarcă acum Donorium, programează-te și donează!",2018-12-03T02:38:38Z,2023-06-26T14:22:16Z

ro,Romania,Medical,6020,8,1543200460,BlooDoChallenge,ASOCIATIA MEDX,https://apps.apple.com/ro/app/bloodochallenge/id1543200460?uo=4,0.0,4.85154,741,Medical,"Salut! Prin această aplicație digitalizăm carnetul donatorului.
Îți oferim următoarele funcționalități pe care ne-am dori să le încerci:
- Centrul de transfuzie sanguină te informează când e nevoie urgentă de sânge
- Te programezi la donare, nu mai stai la coadă și ajuți la siguranța și fluidizarea procesului de donare (*momentan disponibilă doar în unele centre)
- Acumulezi puncte în urma înregistrării donării de sânge(40/50 - bărbați/femei) sau afereză(40)
- Îți folosești punctele acumulate pentru a accesa ofertele partenerilor noștri (întră în aplicație să-i cunoști)
- Îți folosesti punctele acumulate pentru a concura în clasamentul donatorilor

- Centrul de transfuzie sanguină te notifică cu privire la statusul validării unității de sânge donată - validat(analizele au ieșit bine, sângele poate fi folosit), nevalidată(dieta necorespunzătoare înainte de donare), nevalidată cu rechemare(în cazul în care în urma analizelor a fost găsit ceva suspect și e nevoie de retestare, să fi informat cât de repede) (*momentan disponibilă doar în unele centre)
- Îți trimitem o notificare de mulțumire a2a zi dimineață după donare, conf. legii 63/2019 (* doar la centrele ce nu au activată funcția ""Validarea donării"", vezi mai sus)
- Afli câte zile au mai rămas până la următoarea donare de sânge(70/90 zile - bărbați/femei) sau afereză(30 zile)
- Înregistrarea manuală a donărilor de sânge sau afereză anterioare aplicației (se înregistrează manual în ecranul cu istoricul donărilor, iar pe ele nu se primesc puncte)

- Programarea la colecta mobilă ce va fi utilizată atât de către centrele de transfuzie sanguină cât și de către companii ce organizează campanii de donare de sânge la sediul lor (United Business Center Iași, etc)
- Primești notificare cu aproximativ 7 zile înainte de a putea dona din nou (în cazul în care nu ai deja o programare activă)
- Te informăm în aplicație care sunt organizatorii de campanii, tombole, colecte mobile și care sunt datele tale personale care ajung la ei pentru a te lăsa pe tine să decizi nivelul de participare
Mai lucrăm și la urmatoarele funcționalități cerute de către donatori:
- Se lucrează la notificarea pentru utilizatorii noi ce vor fi anunțați după câteva zile dacă nu și-au înregistrat o donare sau o programare
Știm de următoarele probleme din aplicație

- Pe iOS s-a rezolvat problema cu primirea de notificări, în schimb încă nu funcționează bine navigarea din notificare(orice notificare pentru o campanie ar trebui să te ducă în detaliile ei, dar nu se întamplă așa momentan)
Dacă ai întrebări, sugestii sau vrei să contribui, ne vom bucura dacă ne vei scrie pe (tot aici anunțăm și ultimele noutăți):
- facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/bloodochallenge
- facebook public group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/289267915787035
- instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bloodochallenge/
- twitter: https://twitter.com/do_bloo
Viața e în sângele tău, dă mai departe!",2021-01-29T08:00:00Z,2025-07-01T10:38:55Z

ro,Romania,Medical,6020,9,1093774002,Baby + | Your Baby Tracker,Philips Digital UK Limited,https://apps.apple.com/ro/app/baby-your-baby-tracker/id1093774002?uo=4,0.0,4.83678,484,Medical,"Baby born? Congratulations! Download the Baby+ tracker app to help you track your baby’s growth, development and upcoming milestones. Plus read lots of supportive articles and watch breastfeeding video guides for free!

We’re trusted by over 80 million parents for our pregnancy and baby apps, so let us guide you through the first 1,000 days with our baby growth trackers and baby development trackers, together with useful tools to help you record your exciting newborn milestones and memories!
The Most Important Information for your Baby
•  Daily blogs provide you with the right info at the right time
•  Weekly development guides shows the growth of your baby, tailored to your baby’s age
•  Parenting guides support you through your first year
•  Breastfeeding videos give you a visual guide to help with your baby’s latching
•  Recovery tips ensure you look after yourself after labour
•  Activity ideas give you age-appropriate activities to keep your baby entertained
Tracking Tools
•  Growth Tracker helps you follow your baby’s growth
•  Feeding Tracker monitors your breastfeeding, expressing & bottle feeding
•  Weight Tracker tracks your own weight, if you want to
•  Sleep & Soothing Tracker follows your baby’s behaviour patterns
•  Baby Health Tracker logs temperature, medications & vaccinations
•  Nappy Tracker lets you monitor how often your baby needs changing
Create Memories
•  Daily Journal helps you remember all your wonderful experiences
•  Moments captures beautiful memories with your baby to share & look back on
•  Milestones tracks baby milestones like grabbing, crawling & walking
•  Teeth Tracker logs your baby’s teeth development against monthly reference charts
Personalised to You
•  Articles, guides & reminders tailored to YOU, based on your baby’s date of birth
•  Add your baby’s name & photo to make your baby’s development tracker more personal
•  Share the app with loved ones to follow & track your baby’s growth together
•  Support for multiple children or twins to record your unique family as individuals
And More
•  Appointment tracker helps you keep track of you & your baby’s appointments
•  Lullabies to help your little one fall asleep; receive a new Disney lullaby for free each month
•  White Noise to help calm your baby with womb, rain and even hairdryer sounds
Baby+ syncs with Apple's Health App, but cannot read from or write to the Health App Database unless you grant access.
Follow us on Social Media
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BabyPlusApp
Instagram: @babyplus_app
Download the Baby+ tracker app today!
Pregnancy + and Baby + have been trusted by over 80 million parents. Download the most beloved Baby+, your baby tracker for baby development and baby growth now! Both you and your baby will benefit
Privacy Policy: https://info.philips-digital.com/PrivacyNoticeBaby?locale=en&country=US
Terms of Use: https://info.philips-digital.com/TermsOfUse?locale=en&country=US

This Baby App is not intended for medical use, or to replace the advice of a trained medical doctor. Philips Consumer Lifestyle B.V. disclaims any liability for the use or misuse you make based on the App, which is provided to you on a general information basis only and not as a substitute for personalised medical advice. If you have any concerns about your health or your baby’s, consult with your doctor, paediatrician or healthcare provider immediately.
The Baby + tracker app wishes you and your baby a happy and memory-filled first year together!",2016-05-25T09:37:28Z,2025-11-20T11:34:38Z

ro,Romania,Medical,6020,10,1309253074,Complete Anatomy for iPhone,3D4Medical.com,https://apps.apple.com/ro/app/complete-anatomy-for-iphone/id1309253074?uo=4,0.0,4.91378,58,Medical,"***THE WORLD’S LEADING 3D ANATOMY PLATFORM! TRY IT FOR FREE TODAY***

Access Complete Anatomy from ALL your compatible devices with a single annual subscription.

ro,Romania,Medical,6020,13,1638985986,MedRadar,Daniel Gorgan,https://apps.apple.com/ro/app/medradar/id1638985986?uo=4,0.0,4.88406,69,Medical,"MedRadar - Descoperă Produse Farmaceutice în Apropierea Ta

Cu MedRadar, poți găsi rapid și ușor produsele farmaceutice de care ai nevoie în apropierea ta. Indiferent dacă cauți medicamente, suplimente, produse pentru sănătatea personală sau alte articole farmaceutice, MedRadar îți oferă acces la o bază de date extinsă și actualizată cu informații despre farmacii și stocurile lor.

Prin intermediul tehnologiei de localizare a dispozitivului tău mobil, MedRadar identifică farmaciile din zona ta și îți afișează produsele disponibile în fiecare dintre ele. Nu mai trebuie să umbli dintr-o farmacie în alta sau să cauți pe internet. Cu doar câteva apăsări de buton, poți afla unde găsești exact ceea ce cauți, economisind timp și efort.
Principalele caracteristici ale aplicației MedRadar includ:

Căutare eficientă: Cu un design intuitiv și o interfață prietenoasă, MedRadar îți permite să cauți rapid produse farmaceutice după denumire, brand sau categorie. Poți rafina căutarea după distanță și alte filtre relevante pentru a obține rezultatele cele mai potrivite nevoilor tale.

Informații detaliate: Fiecare produs listat în aplicație este însoțit de informații detaliate, cum ar fi prețul, descrierea, compoziția și disponibilitatea în farmacii. Astfel, poți lua o decizie informată înainte de a merge la farmacie.

Farmacii locale și lanțuri de farmacii: MedRadar acoperă o gamă largă de farmacii independente și lanțuri de farmacii, oferindu-ți o perspectivă completă asupra stocurilor disponibile în zona ta. Indiferent de preferințele tale, MedRadar te poate ajuta să găsești cea mai apropiată și convenabilă opțiune pentru tine.

Evaluări și recenzii: MedRadar îți oferă posibilitatea de a evalua și de a lăsa recenzii despre farmaciile pe care le-ai vizitat. Aceasta poate fi o modalitate utilă de a împărtăși experiențele tale cu alți utilizatori și de a contribui la comunitatea MedRadar.

Opțiuni de autentificare: Pentru o experiență simplificată, poți utiliza platformele de autentificare Google sau Facebook pentru a-ți crea și gestiona contul MedRadar. Aceasta îți oferă posibilitatea de a te conecta rapid și de a sincroniza preferințele tale între dispozitive.

Confidențialitate și securitate: Ne luăm în serios confidențialitatea și securitatea datelor tale. Informațiile personale colectate sunt utilizate exclusiv în scopul oferirii serviciului MedRadar și sunt protejate conform celor mai înalte standarde de securitate.

Suport și feedback: Echipa MedRadar este aici pentru a te ajuta. Dacă ai întrebări, sugestii sau întâmpini probleme, ne poți contacta la adresa de email contact@medradar.ro. Apreciem feedback-ul tău și suntem dedicați îmbunătățirii continue a experienței tale cu MedRadar.

MedRadar reprezintă partenerul tău de încredere în căutarea produselor farmaceutice. Descarcă acum aplicația MedRadar și explorează o modalitate mai eficientă și convenabilă de a găsi produsele de care ai nevoie în farmaciile din apropierea ta.",2023-06-15T07:00:00Z,2025-09-12T19:48:44Z

ro,Romania,Medical,6020,14,1034069206,Anatomy 3D Atlas,Catfish Animation Studio S.r.l.,https://apps.apple.com/ro/app/anatomy-3d-atlas/id1034069206?uo=4,0.0,4.75926,54,Medical,"This app is freely downloadable, however in-app purchase is required to unlock the contents.
The complete Skeletal System and a few other contents are always freely accessible enabling you to try the app properly.
Anatomy 3D Atlas"" allows you to study human anatomy in an easy and interactive way.
Through a simple and intuitive interface it is possible to observe every anatomical structure from any angle.
The anatomical 3D models are particularly detailed and with textures up to 4k resolution.
The subdivision by regions and the predefined views facilitate the observation and the study of single parts or groups of systems and the relationships between different organs.

Anatomy - 3D Atlas"" is an application aimed at medical students, doctors, physiotherapists, paramedics, nurses, athletic trainers and in anyone interested in deepening their knowledge of human anatomy.
This app is a fantastic tool to complement classic human anatomy books.
ANATOMICAL 3D MODELS
• Musculoskeletal system
• Cardiovascular system
• Nervous system
• Respiratory System
• Digestive System
• Urogenital system (male and female)
• Endocrine system
• Lymphatic system
• Eye and ear system
FEATURES
• Simple and intuitive interface
• Rotate and zoom each model in 3D space
• Option to hide or isolate single or multiple selected models
• Filter to hide or display each system
• Search function to easily find every anatomical part
• Bookmark function to save custom views
• Smart rotation which moves the center of rotation automatically
• Transparency function
• Visualization of muscles through levels of layers from the superficial ones down to the deepest ones
• By selecting a model or a pin, the related anatomical term shows up
• Description of the muscles: origin, insertion, innervation and action
• Show/Hide UI interface (very useful with small screens)
MULTILINGUAL
• The anatomical terms and the user interface are available in 12 languages: Latin, English, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Chinese, Japanese, Korean and Turkish
• The anatomical terms can be displayed in two languages simultaneously",2015-09-16T05:59:16Z,2025-03-20T23:46:31Z

ro,Romania,Medical,6020,15,1169136078,Huckleberry: Baby & Child,Huckleberry Labs Inc.,https://apps.apple.com/ro/app/huckleberry-baby-child/id1169136078?uo=4,0.0,4.96544,1910,Medical,"Huckleberry is your all-in-one parenting partner, proudly trusted by 5+ million families worldwide.

From baby tracker to personalized guidance, our award-winning app helps you navigate sleep, feeding, milestones, and everything in between. Backed by a team of pediatric experts and powered by smart tools, Huckleberry supports each family’s unique journey. We turn restless nights into restful routines, making more space for everyday magic.
TRUSTED SLEEP GUIDANCE & TRACKING

Your baby's sleep and daily rhythms are unique. Our comprehensive baby tracker helps you understand their natural patterns while providing expert sleep guidance every step of the way. From breastfeeding to nappies, our newborn tracker gives you peace of mind in those early days and beyond.
SWEETSPOT®: YOUR SLEEP TIMING COMPANION

A most-loved feature that predicts your baby's ideal nap times with remarkable accuracy. No more guessing about sleep windows or watching for tired cues—SweetSpot® learns your child's unique rhythms to suggest optimal sleep times. Available with Plus and Premium memberships.
BERRY: 24/7 PARENTING GUIDANCE

Instant parenting backup that adapts to what you need, when you need it. Using expert-vetted and AI-powered guidance, Berry can work through the messiness of parenting with you. You can solve challenges, get reassurance, and easily track multiple things at once—all in one AI chat. No matter the moment or mood, you always have backup.
FREE APP FEATURES
• Simple, one-touch baby tracker for sleep, nappy changes, feedings, pumping, growth, potty training, activities and medicine
• Complete breastfeeding timer with tracking for both sides
• Sleep summaries and history, plus average sleep totals
• Track multiple children with individual profiles
• Reminders when it’s time for medication, feedings, and more
• Sync with multiple caregivers across different devices
PLUS MEMBERSHIP
• All free features, and:
• SweetSpot®:  Predicts the ideal time for sleep (2+ months)
• Schedule Creator: Plan age-appropriate sleep schedules
• Insights: Data-driven tips and miniplans for sleep, feedings, and milestones (0-17 months)
• Enhanced Reports: Discover your child’s trends
• AI Logging: Track your child’s day through text, voice message, or photo
PREMIUM MEMBERSHIP
• Everything in Plus, and:
• Berry: 24/7 guidance with our expert-vetted AI chat
• Custom Sleep Plans: expert-designed plans built for your child, with weekly progress check-ins and ongoing support as they grow
GENTLE, EVIDENCE-BASED APPROACH

Our sleep guidance never requires ""crying it out."" Instead, we blend trusted sleep science with gentle, family-centered solutions that respect your parenting style. Every recommendation is made for your family's needs and comfort level.
PERSONALIZED PARENTING SUPPORT
• Expert newborn tracker tools and analytics
• Get custom sleep schedules based on your baby's age and patterns
• Science-backed guidance for common sleep challenges
• Navigate sleep regressions with confidence
• Receive timely recommendations as your baby grows
• Help your newborn develop healthy sleep habits from day one
AWARD-WINNING RESULTS

The Huckleberry baby tracker app ranked #1 in the iOS medical category globally. Today, we help families across 179 countries achieve better sleep. Up to 93% of families using our baby sleep tracking report improved sleep patterns.
Whether you're navigating newborn sleep, infant solids or toddler milestones, Huckleberry provides the tools and guidance your family needs to flourish.

Privacy Policy: https://www.huckleberrycare.com/privacy-policy",2017-07-04T18:17:53Z,2025-11-18T17:29:46Z

ro,Romania,Medical,6020,17,6612007783,OpenEvidence,OpenEvidence Inc.,https://apps.apple.com/ro/app/openevidence/id6612007783?uo=4,0.0,5,8,Medical,"Clinical Decision Support for Healthcare Professionals (NPI Required).

OpenEvidence is the world’s leading medical information platform for health care professionals, providing accurate and efficient answers at the point of care. Every answer on OpenEvidence is always sourced, cited, and grounded in the peer-reviewed medical literature.
Now featuring New England Journal of Medicine (NEJM) published content, NEJM multimedia content, and NEJM invited review articles authored by the world’s leading clinical experts.
• 160 medical specialties
• 1,000+ diseases and therapeutic areas
• 1m+ medical topics
Trusted by medical professionals at 10,000+ care centers across the United States.
OpenEvidence is only available for health care professionals. Users must verify their health care professional status before using OpenEvidence.
AS SEEN IN
Forbes: “OpenEvidence Keeps Doctors Up To Date On The Latest Science”
TESTIMONIALS

“I've been using OpenEvidence for the last week - it has been amazing! Able to narrow down on results quickly and find information that I wasn't able to do with Google/PubMed searches on my own.” - Dr. John Lee, MD. Physician & Faculty Member, Harvard Medical School
“OpenEvidence can be the foundational technology to power all clinical decision tools.” - Dr. Antonio Jorge Forte, MD. Director of MayoExpert, Mayo Clinic

“OpenEvidence is more up-to-date than UpToDate. And more useful regardless, since it’s interactive, and you can ask it questions, and get very specific answers about specific medical fact patterns in a patient case. It’s like having a curbside consult with a team of expert physicians, but that you can carry around with you in your pocket.” - Dr. Ram Dandillaya, MD. Clinical Chief, Department of Cardiology, Cedars-Sinai Medical Center
“I am in community practice and medical director of a community cancer center. OpenEvidence has been an incredible lifeline for daily practitioners.” - C.J., Oncologist
“OpenEvidence is absolutely fantastic. I use it a gazillion times a day.” - J.A., Neurologist

“OpenEvidence’s efforts to make medicine more evidence-based are invaluable. The shift from judgment to calculation can reduce the level of noise currently found in medicine.” - Daniel Kahneman, Nobel Prize Laureate (In Memoriam)
“It is light years ahead of the next best medical oriented AI I have used.” - R.E.., Oncologist
STAY SHARP & UP-TO-DATE
• Find what you need, when you need it on a mobile-native platform.
• The world’s most powerful medical search engine at your fingertips.
• Discover and find exactly what you are looking for with deep search and a highly intuitive user interface that understands you and what you are asking.",2024-08-15T07:00:00Z,2025-11-20T21:17:11Z

ro,Romania,Medical,6020,22,707430013,Best Menstrual Period Tracker,Anastasia Kovba,https://apps.apple.com/ro/app/best-menstrual-period-tracker/id707430013?uo=4,0.0,4.76161,323,Medical,"The application is based on the scientific research. It helps to determine the fertile days of the month, so you can either achieve or avoid pregnancy. The application uses the date of the last period and shows the date of the next period, the best days to conceive a baby, the ovulation day and when you can avoid pregnancy.
* Scientific Research *

The popular baby gender prediction method is used by default. But it’s based only on the widely-spread theory by Landrum Shettles. The application also supports the scientific baby gender prediction method. It’s based on the scientific research by Rodrigo Guerrero and the statistics of thousands of women.

You can change the gender prediction method on the “Settings” screen. But remember that either gender prediction method shows only slightly higher chances of conceiving a girl or a boy and it never guarantees the result.
* Full Version *
This is the full version of the application. You will be able to see the following data:
- The probability of getting pregnant on the current or on any selected day.
- The probability of conceiving a girl or a boy using the selected gender prediction method.
- Chances of getting pregnant during the current period.
- Chances of conceiving a girl or a boy during the current period.
* How to Use *
To generate the menstrual calendar you have to provide the following data:
- The first day of the last cycle (select the day and use the button “Add”).
- Average length of the menstrual cycle (adjust it on the “Settings” screen).
- Length of the luteal phase (most women can use the default value).
The application works best for women with regular menstrual cycle. But average cycle length is also a good way to predict when the ovulation should happen.",2013-11-20T00:19:39Z,2021-05-10T20:49:44Z

ro,Romania,Medical,6020,24,1469601691,Heart Rate Health - Pulse Log,Sergey Mosin,https://apps.apple.com/ro/app/heart-rate-health-pulse-log/id1469601691?uo=4,0.0,4.70629,143,Medical,"Heart Rate — Your Personal Health Tracker

Your heart health is the foundation of your overall well-being, and staying on top of it is the key to a healthier, more active life. Heart Rate is a simple, intuitive, and powerful app designed to monitor your pulse, analyze health data, and support smarter lifestyle decisions.
Why Heart Rate Matters

Your pulse speaks volumes about your health. By regularly tracking it, you can detect changes early and gain a deeper understanding of your body. Whether you're managing blood pressure, aiming to lose weight, or just staying informed, Heart Rate is the perfect companion.
Features That Work for You
• Daily Pulse Measurement with the Camera. Just place your finger on the camera to get started — no special devices needed.
• Blood Pressure Tracking. Log your readings to monitor trends and spot crucial changes.
• Symptom Journal and Wellness Tracking. Record how you feel to uncover connections between symptoms and activity.
• Detailed Graphs for Any Timeframe. View your data over a day, (month and year available by subscription)  with clear, visual insights.
• Measurement History and Insights. Keep all your records in one place for easy analysis or sharing with your doctor(available by subscription).
• Apple Watch Support. Measure your pulse directly from your wrist.
• Physical Fitness Analysis. See how your endurance and activity levels are improving.
• Heart Rate Zones. Discover when you're burning fat or boosting your cardio performance.
• Apple Health Integration. All your health data synced for seamless access.
• Compare Your Data to Norms. See how your stats stack up against averages for your age and gender.
• Informative Articles and Tips. Learn about the most critical heart health metrics and how to improve them.
The Analysis Tab: Our Crown Jewel

We’re especially proud of this feature. The Analysis tab goes beyond numbers. It gives you a full picture of your heart health, comparing your resting heart rate and endurance with statistical norms for your age and gender. For fitness enthusiasts, it even identifies pulse zones to help you maximize fat burn or enhance cardio performance. Everything is straightforward, actionable, and built to make your health journey smoother.
Important Disclaimer
The Heart Rate app is for informational purposes only and is not intended for medical use. Always consult a doctor for diagnosis and treatment.
Heart Rate is your ultimate tool for health tracking, making it easier than ever to stay informed, proactive, and in control. Start prioritizing your heart today!
